properties.name: application.db-encryption-password-for-strings
properties.description: Password for encrypting text in db

properties.name: application.db-encryption-password-for-bytes
properties.description: Password for encrypting blobs in db

properties.name: application.remote-cert-lookup
properties.description: A flag if a remote certificate lookup is enabled

properties.name: application.kms-type
properties.description: A KMS implementation to be used: local|remote

properties.name: application.certificate-dn-template
properties.description: A template sting for DN in generated certificate

properties.name: application.fortanix-trust-store-type
properties.description: Keystore type holding Fortanix HTTP public certificate

properties.name: application.fortanix-trust-store-path
properties.description: Path to keystore holding Fortanix HTTP public certificate

properties.name: application.fortanix-trust-store-password
properties.description: Password to keystore holding Fortanix HTTP public certificate

properties.name: application.built-in-cert-mapping
properties.description: A cert mapping that must always exit in db in format <signingKeyIdSrc>=<signingKeyIdDst or certDn>

properties.name: application.certificate-key-size
properties.description: Key size to be used by a signing certificate: 2048 by default

properties.name: application.certificate-hash-type
properties.description: Signature hash type to be used by a signing certificate: SHA256withRSA by default

properties.name: application.access-tokens
properties.description: HTTP Basic Auth sha256 hashes, comma separated
